name: Bloom (itch) (DrTwo)
description:
CONTROLS:

W- Jump

A & D - Left and right

(Arrow keys and Space bar are optional Controls)

GOAL:

Collect all the Sunflowers

This is my final project for my Fundamentals of Game Art class. This is my first ever take on making any sort of video game and I tried my best with the resources that I was provided with. I hope you enjoy my single level :)
